name: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game 4 FANMADE
name_original: Jack and Jerk: Off The Game 4 FANMADE
description:
Jack, Jerk and Friends are back once again to make you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH in this worlds scariest game... Buckle up, because this game allows you to make literally everything you could in the last games (except the infinite map). This alone will make you definitely go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!! Also to make you go more AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH this game has a new character, mouse character placing, CUSTOM CHARACTERS and the ability to change the color of the background! Crazy right?! This will MOST DEFINITELY make you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!! And the craziest thing is, that this game is 69420D! You heard me right, this game is 69420D! If the things that I said didn't make you go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH, this certainly will. Be warned though. If you play this game for too long, Jack, Jerk and their Friends themselves might come under your bed at night and they're gonna go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!! Which might give you a heart attack. Then when your relatives wake up and see your dead body and they too will go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!! And probably die too. I warned you.

Credits:

  • The original game: https://mint-water.itch.io/
  • Coding: ME!!!
  • Art: ME!!!
  • Character design: https://mint-water.itch.io/ and ME!!!
